text: Na ka kyerε agyidiefoͻ mmaa no nso sε: “Wͻ’merε wͻn ani ase (mfri nhwε bͻne ho), na wͻnhwε wͻn ananmu so yie; na wͻnhwε na wͻn annyi wͻn afεεfεdeε no adi, gyesε deε ada adi wͻ mu (tesε wͻ’nsa ne wͻn anim ne wͻn nan ase). Na wͻnfa wͻn tri so akatasoͻ no nkata wͻn ho ma εmeduru wͻn koko; na wͻnhwε na wͻn amfa wͻn ahoͻfε ankyerε (obi); gyesε wͻn kununom, anaasε wͻn agyanom, anaa wͻn kununom agyanom, anaa wͻn mma mmarima, anaa wͻn kunu mma mmarima, anaa wͻn nua mmarima, anaa wͻn nnua mmarima mma mmarima, anaa wͻn nnua mmaa mma mmarima, anaa wͻn (yͻnkonom) mmaa, anaa wͻn mfenaa a wͻ’yε wͻn dea, anaa mmarima asomfoͻ a wͻ’nni mmaa ho ahoͻden, anaa nkͻdaa a wͻ’nnim mmaa adagya mu asεm. Na εmma wͻ’nnfa wͻn nnan mpem hͻ sεdeε wͻ’bεyi wͻn afεεfεdeε a asuma no adie. Agyidiefoͻ, monyinaa monsakra moadwen sεdeε mobedi nkonim”
